Well Lance!
 
I guess the gauntlet has been thrown!
 
do your best
 
Bruce
=

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


To: EVP-ITC@...=
mFrom: orbhunterx@...: Tue, 4 Dec 2007 03:41:44 +0000Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?




I'll take that as=
 a challange, Bruce!After proper burn in time, to attune the Box to me, I w=
ill go forth.I plan to take it to several places that I know spirits dwell.=
 We shall see through experimental questions what is what...Lance--- In EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>>=
 Frank,> > After doing box research for a while now and having the opportun=
ity to work with several different> types of boxes. I would have to agree t=
he boxes are meant for and work better as a stationary communication device=
 > sort of like a communication station that is consistently under the same=
 basic conditions. I have never taken my boxes out of my home> or done a se=
ssion out side of my home and I don't believe that taking the box , any box=
 not just yours to a remote allegedly haunted location> will not serve to e=
nhance communication. And if anyone is really concerned about summoning dar=
k entities they have a much better chance> of that communicating with a gro=
unded and maybe disgruntled or confused entity at a haunted location.> > so=
 I agree with your assessment of box use 100%> > Bruce> > Bruce Halliday Pa=
ranormal Investigating Team > > > To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; hauntedtimes=
@...: franks-boxes@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2007 14:43:43 -0700Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?> > > > > This 'negativity'=
 is bad enough, I wouldn't even want it on the group except Moon is the one=
 that says everyone else, me and the group included, gets only 'false commu=
ncation' or 'bad guys', and that's from his own friggin' blog, I didn't mak=
e that up, or pull it out of my butt. So it effects us all, and I think is =
open for discussion/comment knowing this will get forwarded back to him. In=
 fact I'll cc Moon this posting. When he says all these scan radio users, t=
hat means me to, since I use the things, and I prefer the linear scan mode.=
 What I say about the box use is completely disregarded, and what I get thr=
ough the box, myself, as The Box Maker, is minimalized by Moon. Moon puts m=
y name out there connected with his so called 'telephone to the dead', and =
I very much disapprove of my name being applied to an unauthorized use of m=
y equipment. I don't give a crap what he gets through the boxes, or does wi=
th it, but don't make it look like I designed it specificaly as the 'teleph=
one to the dead', I designed it as a friggin' ITC device, that is capable o=
f two way communication--SOMETIMES, it's not like it's a guarenteed connect=
ion, and you can't just dial up anyone, anytime, that's an exageration! The=
 "box" was intended by me to be used in a fixed location, just by taking it=
 to a GHU, or an "investiigation" is using it in a way I did not intend, an=
d I still say it's better if used in one place. All guide lines I have offe=
red for box use are completely ignored, not just by Moon, to be fair. It ha=
s been shown that many different approaches work for this communcation, I s=
uggest Moon design and build his own 'telephone the dead' and leave my name=
 out of it. Frank-S> > > Connect and share in new ways with Windows Live. C=
onnect now! > > > > > > > > _______________________________________________=
___________> Your smile counts. The more smiles you share, the more we dona=
te.  Join in.> www.windowslive.com/smile?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wave2_oprsmilewlh=
mtagline>
